about_the_game:
After coming out of hibernation early, you need to find honey to wake up the rest of your bear family! Solve dozens of puzzles in this cute sokoban-style adventure, while meeting other woodland animals. Discover your surroundings as you explore peaceful meadows, icy valleys and bubbling swamps!

Solve Fun Puzzles
Push stones, squash bushes, and spook bunnies as you mosey through the meadows. Your path is yours to choose, and you'll never get stuck on just one tricky puzzle. Unlimited undo and reset let you try until you succeed. Each area contains dozens of self-contained challenges, and a few more that require thinking outside the box!

Coexist
It's springtime, and the woods are teeming with life! Meet other cute animals like the timid rabbits, industrious beavers, and the beautiful songbirds. Some need your help, and some might even return the favor! Bring a hare a carrot, for example, and they'll let you use their tunnels to fast-travel.

Explore
A gentle and engaging experience for all ages and skill levels. Your adventure will take you to every corner of the forest, each with it's own unique mechanics. If you're determined, you may find hidden secrets and collect honey to unlock even more devious puzzles!

name: Baby Bear's Big Day Out Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: After coming out of hibernation early, you need to find honey to wake up the rest of your bear family! Solve dozens of puzzles in this cute sokoban-style adventure, while meeting other woodland animals. Discover your surroundings as you explore peaceful meadows, icy valleys and bubbling swamps!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
